mission: Vermont ABA promotes the science and application of behavior analysis to improve the lives of individuals and families in Vermont.

name: Virginia Association for Behavior Analysis (VABA)
mission: VABA promotes the science and application of behavior analysis to improve the lives of individuals and families in Virginia.

name: Washington Association for Behavior Analysis (WABA)
mission: WABA promotes the science and application of behavior analysis to improve the lives of individuals and families in Washington.

name: West Virginia Association for Behavior Analysis (WVABA)
mission: WVABA promotes the science and application of behavior analysis to improve the lives of individuals and families in West Virginia.

name: Wisconsin Association for Behavior Analysis (WisABA)
mission: WisABA promotes the science and application of behavior analysis to improve the lives of individuals and families in Wisconsin.

name: Wyoming Association for Behavior Analysis (WyABA)
mission: WyABA promotes the science and application of behavior analysis to improve the lives of individuals and families in Wyoming.

name: Association for Psychological Science (APS)
mission: APS promotes the advancement, representation, and dissemination of psychological science to support individuals and families.

name: National Association for Addiction Professionals (NAADAC)
mission: NAADAC provides education, advocacy, and resources for addiction professionals to support individuals and families dealing with addiction.

name: American Association for Marriage and Family Therapy (AAMFT)
mission: AAMFT promotes the well-being of individuals and families through the advancement of marriage and family therapy.

name: American Psychological Association (APA)
mission: APA advances the science and practice of psychology to benefit individuals and families through research, education, and advocacy.

name: Behavior Analyst Certification Board (BACB)
mission: BACB promotes and ensures the highest standards in behavior analysis certification to support individuals and families.

name: Children and Adults with Attention-Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder (CHADD)
mission: CHADD provides education, support, and advocacy for individuals and families affected by ADHD.

name: Depression and Bipolar Support Alliance (DBSA)
mission: DBSA provides support, education, and advocacy for individuals and families affected by depression and bipolar disorder.

name: Families for Depression Awareness
mission: Families for Depression Awareness offers education, resources, and support to families coping with depression.

name: National Alliance on Mental Illness (NAMI)
mission: NAMI provides education, support, and advocacy for individuals and families affected by mental illness.

name: Mental Health America (MHA)
mission: MHA works to promote mental health, prevent mental illness, and improve the overall well-being of individuals and families.
